item.description:
EVENT: Celebrate the festival of Sukkot with your friends from MOSAIC at the home and sukkah of a member. You’ll be able to fulfill the mitzvah of sitting in the sukkah and saying the blessing over the lulav and the etrog. You’ll also have the opportunity to enjoy a light nosh and beverages. Kosher food will be provided.

RSVP: REQUIRED by October 4 by registering on Paypal (see directions below). 

If you are unable to pay via Paypal, please mail checks (payable to Mosaic of MA or MOMC) to P.O. Box 1821 / Brookline, MA 02446-0015.  Be sure to time your mailing, so the check arrives at Mosaic's P.O. box by October 4 (so you will be counted as an attendee).

DO NOTMAIL YOUR PAYMENTS TO THE LOCATION OF THIS EVENT, AS THEY WILL NOT BE CREDITED CORRECTLY.

Limited to 40 people, so RSVP EARLY.

MEET: 8 – 11PM, Member's home in Newton. Location and directions will be provided when payment is received.

COST: $7 + additional $5 for non-members.
Please consider bringing a non-perishable food or toiletry contribution for Family Table, greater Boston’s Jewish food pantry. (No meat or shellfish ingredients, please.)

PayPal Registration Instructions: (You can use this payment option even if you don’t already have a PayPal account; just look below the PayPal login area and click on the "Don't have a PayPal account" link.) Your RSVP will not be confirmed until payment is received.
•Option 1: Go to the event listing on the Mosaic website, http://mosaicofmass.org/mosaic/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=65:evening-in-the-sukkah&catid=3:recreational&Itemid=4and click on the PayPal button at the end of the post.
OR
•Option 2: go to www.paypal.com and follow directions to “Buy"-->"Make a Payment...". In the “To” address field, enter paypal@mosaicofmass.org
item.how_to_find_us: Directions will be provided when you sign up

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Evening in the Sukkah
